translation.en: When do I get to visit her?
translation.zh: 我什么时候能去看她？

translation.en: That's gonna be tricky,
translation.zh: 那可不太好办

translation.en: cos if the doctors see you, they put two and two together and...
translation.zh: 要是医生看到你把你们联系在一起…

translation.en: I'll see what I can do.
translation.zh: 我看能不能想想办法吧

translation.en: If I write a note, would you give it to her?
translation.zh: 要是我写个字条 你能交给她吗？

translation.en: Yeah, course.
translation.zh: 当然可以

translation.en: Now eat up.
translation.zh: 先吃东西吧

translation.en: (Lee) What the fuck's he doing here?
translation.zh: 他来干什么？

translation.en: - Who's that, Lee? - Fuck. Soldier out of Summerhouse.
translation.zh: -谁啊？李-夏日公寓外围放哨的

translation.en: - Is he the one that lost that bit of grub? - Yeah, that's the cunt.
translation.zh: -就是他把我们的货弄丢了吗？-对 就是他

translation.en: You've got a fucking cheek, in't ya? What you doing?
translation.zh: 胆子不小啊？你来干什么？

translation.en: - Came to give Bobby his paper. - Give me the fucking money.
translation.zh: -来把钱给博比-给我就行了 拿来

translation.en: I wanna give it to him personally.
translation.zh: -我想当面交给他-快给我 小子

translation.en: Give me the fucking paper. Go on, go on, gimme.
translation.zh: -我想当面交给他-快给我 小子 快点…给我

translation.en: I think Bobby wants to see me. Fuck you, you cunt.
translation.zh: -看来博比想见我-去你的 混蛋

translation.en: (Raikes) Sit down.
translation.zh: 坐

translation.en: What's your name, kid? Dushane.
translation.zh: -你叫什么？小子-杜桑恩

translation.en: - You got some paperwork for me? - Yeah.
translation.zh: -你有票子要给我？-对

translation.en: - It don't wanna be shy. - It's all there, man.
translation.zh: -最好别少了-都在了

translation.en: You got two minutes. Let me ask you a question, yeah?
translation.zh: -给你两分钟-我问个问题 好吧？

translation.en: Why we gotta make it so hard for the customers?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要为难顾客？

translation.en: Feds know people are buying and selling in Hackney, right?
translation.zh: 警察知道有人在哈克尼区贩卖毒品 对吧？

translation.en: Now as long as we don't make no noise, they don't really care.
translation.zh: 只要我们不太过分他们就不会动真格的

translation.en: It's part of the fabric of life, innit?
translation.zh: 这就是生活的一部分 对吧？

translation.en: Fabric of life? Look, this is all very interesting, but...
translation.zh: 生活的一部分？你说的这些很有意思 但…

translation.en: Let me run Summerhouse.
translation.zh: 让我负责夏日公寓

translation.en: That position's filled. You know that.
translation.zh: 已经有人负责了 你知道的

translation.en: I ain't dubbing Lee or nothing, yeah?
translation.zh: 我不是要排挤李什么的

translation.en: But you think Kamale and them London Fields boys
translation.zh: 可你觉得李要是好好干他该干的

translation.en: could come into Summerhouse if he was doing his job right?
translation.zh: 卡马力和伦敦帮那些人能随便闯进去吗？

translation.en: I know you and Lee are tight,
translation.zh: 我知道你和李关系很好

translation.en: but that don't change what happened, man, and it shouldn't have happened.
translation.zh: 但事实就是事实而那原本是可以避免的

translation.en: So, what do you want from me? Eight ounces of brown to start.
translation.zh: -你想要我怎样？-先来200克未提纯的

translation.en: Eight? I can move that easy.
translation.zh: -200克？-我很容易就能转手

translation.en: So, you wanna do business with me, yeah?
translation.zh: -看来你想跟我做生意 是吧？-没错

translation.en: - That's right. - Why?
translation.zh: -看来你想跟我做生意 是吧？-没错 -为什么？-我想生活

translation.en: - I want a life. - But you're breathing, ain't you?
translation.zh: -为什么？-我想生活 -你不是活着的吗？-我想过好日子

translation.en: I want a good life.
translation.zh: -你不是活着的吗？-我想过好日子

translation.en: I was born and bred in Summerhouse. I'm 26 years old.
translation.zh: 我生长在夏日公寓 我都26岁了

translation.en: I got nothing else to be except this.
translation.zh: 除了这事 我一无所长

translation.en: I was born in Summerhouse.
translation.zh: 我也是出生在夏日公寓的

translation.en: We gonna do business or what?
translation.zh: 我们到底做不做生意？

translation.en: (Vincent) Light very important.
translation.zh: 光照很重要

translation.en: Always keep this distance from here.
translation.zh: 一定要保持这个距离

translation.en: What about the water?
translation.zh: -那水呢？-水在这边

translation.en: Water, water is here. Pump is always on.
translation.zh: -那水呢？-水在这边 水泵一直开着 你喜欢园艺吗？

translation.en: - Do you like gardening? - Me? Yeah, I love gardening.
translation.zh: 水泵一直开着 你喜欢园艺吗？ 我？我喜欢园艺不过这可不像种番茄 是吧？

translation.en: - It's not like growing tomatoes, is it? - Same thing, but different.
translation.zh: 我？我喜欢园艺不过这可不像种番茄 是吧？ 一样的 又不太一样

translation.en: Well, you don't go to prison for growing tomatoes in a window box, do ya?
translation.zh: 在窗台花架里种番茄可不会让你进监狱 对吧？

translation.en: Most important thing not to go to prison - smell.
translation.zh: 不想进监狱最重要的就是气味

translation.en: - Smell? - Smell from the plant, very strong.
translation.zh: -气味-这植物的气味很重

translation.en: Extractor. Take away the smell.
translation.zh: 抽离器 可以带走气味

translation.en: - How long's it take to grow a crop? - Thirteen weeks.
translation.zh: -种出一批要多长时间？-13周

translation.en: Now, when you grow you must always have shiny leaf, dark green.
translation.zh: 等长熟了 叶子就会发亮 要深绿色 浅了不行 黄了也不行都说明你没种对

translation.en: Pale no good. Yellow no good. Means you not feed it right.
translation.zh: 要深绿色 浅了不行 黄了也不行都说明你没种对

translation.en: Every day you check the pH water.
translation.zh: 每天都要检查水的酸碱度

translation.en: Temperature.
translation.zh: 还有温度 确定水泵一直在运作

translation.en: Make sure pump is always working. Shiny, shiny leaf, huh?
translation.zh: 还有温度 确定水泵一直在运作 要发亮的叶子你愿意的话我可以直接跟你买

translation.en: You want, I buy your crop off you.
translation.zh: 要发亮的叶子你愿意的话我可以直接跟你买

translation.en: - What you gonna give me for it? - I give you good price.
translation.zh: 你拿什么跟我买？ -我会出个好价钱-多少？

translation.en: - What price? - Good price.
translation.zh: -我会出个好价钱-多少？ 反正是好价钱

translation.en: No, no, Vincent, I need the exact price. I need to have this all worked out.
translation.zh: 不行 文森特 我需要具体数字我得把这事做成

translation.en: Ah, don't worry. I give you good price, all right?
translation.zh: 别担心 我会给你好价钱的 好吗？

translation.en: - (Dushane) What's going on? - What's happening? All right?
translation.zh: -怎么了？-怎么了？还好吗？

translation.en: - What's this? - There's a name in there.
translation.zh: -这是什么？-里面有个名字

translation.en: It's got to be this one, the right one.
translation.zh: 一定得是这根手指 右手的

translation.en: (Leon) You all right, girl? What you saying?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？姑娘 觉得怎么样？

translation.en: Ra'Nell put some clothes together for you. And he asked me to give you this.
translation.zh: 拉内尔帮你收拾了几件衣服他还让我把这个交给你

translation.en: (Leon) He's a good kid, you know?
translation.zh: 他是个好孩子

translation.en: (Chuckles) He's got some fire in his belly. He's all right.
translation.zh: 他肚子里憋着一股劲儿 他没事

translation.en: Listen, Lise.
translation.zh: 听着 丽萨

translation.en: They've got you on all these drugs to stabilise you, and that's all right for now,
translation.zh: 他们给你用药是为了让你稳定 现阶段没关系

translation.en: but I've seen too many people stay doped up on these things,
translation.zh: 但我见过太多人对这些东西产生了依赖性

translation.en: and that ain't no way to get better, trust me.
translation.zh: 那是没法痊愈的 相信我

translation.en: So, when you're feeling up to it, I want you to come to the gym and train.
translation.zh: 所以如果你感觉想用药了我要你去健身房锻炼

translation.en: It'll do you good. And don't worry about Ra'Nell.
translation.zh: 那对你有好处 不用担心拉内尔

translation.en: I'll look after him. He'll be all right.
translation.zh: 我会照顾他 不会有事的

translation.en: If your mum doesn't come home tonight, are you gonna call someone?
translation.zh: 要是你妈妈今晚没回来你会打电话找人吗？

translation.en: I don't need to. I already know where she is.
translation.zh: 不需要 我知道她在哪儿了

translation.en: Where?
translation.zh: 在哪儿？

translation.en: Come on, tell me.
translation.zh: 说吧 告诉我

translation.en: - They put her in a mental hospital. - No.
translation.zh: -她进了精神病院-不会吧

translation.en: When's she coming home? I don't know.
translation.zh: -她什么时候回来？-不知道

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: - She'll be all right though, yeah? - Yeah, hopefully.
translation.zh: -不过她会没事的 对吧？-希望吧

translation.en: Can't even visit her.
translation.zh: 我都不能去看她要是他们发现我 会送我去福利院

translation.en: If they found out about me, they'd put me in care.
translation.zh: 我都不能去看她要是他们发现我 会送我去福利院 -所以千万别告诉任何人 哥们-不会的

translation.en: So don't be telling no one, though. I won't.
translation.zh: -所以千万别告诉任何人 哥们-不会的

translation.en: (Gem) Marnie!
translation.zh: 玛妮

translation.en: (Man) Keep your head still, my bro.
translation.zh: 头别乱动 哥们

translation.en: (2nd man) I'm talking.
translation.zh: 我在说话呢

translation.en: How am I supposed to talk if I can't move my head?
translation.zh: 头不动还怎么说活？

translation.en: (Barber) I can talk without moving my head. Watch me. Did you see my head move?
translation.zh: 我说话就不用动头看我 我头动了吗？

translation.en: That's cos you're chatting shit, cuz.
translation.zh: 那是因为你说的都是废话

translation.en: My head moves when I talk cos I talk important shit.
translation.zh: 我说话就得动头因为我说的都是重要的事

translation.en: And don't use that as an excuse to fuck up my hair.
translation.zh: 发型没给我弄好可别找借口

translation.en: You're done.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Nah, nah. I'm not done, fam, look. Symmetry, fam.
translation.zh: 不行 还没好 哥们你看 都不对称

translation.en: Listen, I'm just about to get in the car, innit, so... I'm gonna have to hang up.
translation.zh: 听着 我要上车了 先挂了

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: - (Sully) Yo, are you Ross, yeah? - Who's asking?
translation.zh: -你是罗斯吗？-你是谁？

translation.en: - (Ross groaning) - (Dushane) Just come on, man.
translation.zh: 老实点 伙计

translation.en: - Sully, would you hurry up? - (Sully) Fucking hold him down.
translation.zh: 你搞什么？快点啊 摁住他

translation.en: Keep still, man.
translation.zh: 别动 伙计

translation.en: (Muffled groaning and screaming)
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: (Dushane) Yo, fam, just come on, man. What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 搞什么啊

translation.en: (Sully) Fucking hold him down.
translation.zh: -你什么毛病？-摁住他

translation.en: - (Snap) - (Muffled groans)
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: - What? What? - It's the wrong finger.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-不是那个手指

translation.en: Bruv, they ain't gonna know the fucking difference.
translation.zh: 他们看不出区别的

translation.en: Course they're gonna know the fucking difference, bruv. Look!
translation.zh: 他们当然能看出区别 你看

translation.en: They look the same to me. You crazy?
translation.zh: 我看着都一样 你疯了吗？

translation.en: I'm telling you now, we need to get the right finger.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 必须要指定的手指

translation.en: You're saying you want me to cut the other finger off now?
translation.zh: 你要我再剪一根手指下来？

translation.en: It's attention to detail, innit? Go on.
translation.zh: 注重细节 不是吗？来吧

translation.en: - You're sick, you know, man? - Come on, bruv.
translation.zh: -你有病 你知道吗？-快点吧

translation.en: (Raikes) My sister's kid, 17 years old, got a glass eye,
translation.zh: 我姐姐的孩子 17岁 装了个假眼

translation.en: all because this got poked in his face.
translation.zh: 就因为这根手指戳到了他脸上

translation.en: Now a situation has become vacant. My mate here, Lee...
translation.zh: 现在情况很清楚了 -我兄弟李 他要走了-恭喜

translation.en: well, he's moving up.
translation.zh: -我兄弟李 他要走了-恭喜

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.zh: -我兄弟李 他要走了-恭喜 所以你俩要跟我一起干了

translation.en: So that means that you two and me are gonna do business together,
translation.zh: 所以你俩要跟我一起干了

translation.en: but we're gonna do business exactly how I say.
translation.zh: 但得完全照我说的来

translation.en: Because what this is is a special relationship.
translation.zh: 因为我们这种关系比较特殊

translation.en: I'm trusting you with my food. You can trust us.
translation.zh: -我可把货托付给你们了-你可以信任我们

translation.en: I know that I can trust you
translation.zh: 我知道可以信任你们

translation.en: because I know who your family are.
translation.zh: 因为我知道你们都有什么家人

translation.en: Give 'em the parcel.
translation.zh: 把包裹给他们

translation.en: Bring me the paper in a week. What about Kamale?
translation.zh: -一周之内把钱拿来给我-卡马力呢？

translation.en: What about him?
translation.zh: 他怎么了？现在夏日公寓归你们管了

translation.en: You boys are running Summerhouse now. Whatever you feel to do, fine by me.
translation.zh: 他怎么了？现在夏日公寓归你们管了 你们想怎么做都行 我无所谓

translation.en: What you saying, cuz? No, chill, man. Jam.
translation.zh: -你好啊 哥们-别 冷静点 哥们

translation.en: I just come to tell you we're running Summerhouse now, ya hear me?
translation.zh: 我只是来告诉你夏日公寓归我们管了 听到了吗？

translation.en: So all them little stunts you pulled before,
translation.zh: 你之前那些手段来抢东西什么的

translation.en: coming in and taking man's food and all that, can't happen again. Understand?
translation.zh: 你之前那些手段来抢东西什么的 没有下次了 明白吗？ 李格林怎么了？

translation.en: So what about Lee Greene?
translation.zh: 李格林怎么了？

translation.en: Don't worry about Lee Greene. He's moved on.
translation.zh: 不用你操心李格林 他走了

translation.en: - (Dushane) What ya doing, man? - (Slash)
translation.zh: -你干什么？伙计-离夏日公寓远点

translation.en: Stay the fuck out of Summerhouse, ya listening?
translation.zh: -你干什么？伙计-离夏日公寓远点 -搞什么啊-听好了

translation.en: What you do that for?
translation.zh: 你为何那样？

translation.en: If you know me, I don't come nowhere just to talk, blood.
translation.zh: 你知道我的 我可不会随便跑来聊天

translation.en: Anyway, I saw his face. He weren't even listening to you. (Snorts)
translation.zh: 而且我看到他的表情了他根本没把你的话放心上

translation.en: You know what you started now, innit?
translation.zh: 你知道你挑起了什么吧？

translation.en: He already started it.
translation.zh: 他之前就挑起来了

translation.en: Two, yeah? All right, holler, innit.
translation.zh: 两份？拿去吧

translation.en: (Chatter)
translation.zh: 你告诉她…

translation.en: Nobody move!
translation.zh: -少来了-都不许动

translation.en: (People groaning and laughing)
translation.zh: 你抖什么？

translation.en: (Dushane) Listen, we've got this place in Finchley, it's all set up. Ready to go.
translation.zh: 听着 我们在芬奇利找了个地方都弄好了 可以用了

translation.en: (Raikes) Going country. That's full on, that's 24/7.
translation.zh: 乡下的警力可严着呢 随时有人查

translation.en: You sure your youngsters can handle that sort of pressure?
translation.zh: 你确定你那些毛孩子能应付那种压力吗？

translation.en: They know what they have to do. How much do you want?
translation.zh: -他们知道得怎么做-你想要多少？

translation.en: Box of each.
translation.zh: 每种一盒

translation.en: (Raikes) That's a lot of money.
translation.zh: 那可是一大笔钱

translation.en: You better know what you're doing.
translation.zh: 你们最好知道自己在干什么

translation.en: (Men chatting quietly, chuckling)
translation.zh: 我知道 哥们

translation.en: Oi! Come, man, let me talk to you quickly.
translation.zh: 过来 我跟你说两句 很快

translation.en: See Dris, Chantelle. They're making mad paper, you know?
translation.zh: 那是德利斯和尚黛尔他们都在赚大钱 知道吗？

translation.en: Even little Michael, 10 years old. Making his money.
translation.zh: 就连迈克 才十岁他都在自己赚钱了

translation.en: What are you lot saying? Wanna make some paper?
translation.zh: 你怎么想？想赚钱吗？

translation.en: - Yeah, I do. - What about you, Ra'Nell?
translation.zh: -我想-你呢？拉内尔

translation.en: Look, bruv, I know your mum's in the Hackney nuthouse, you know.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我知道你妈在哈克尼精神病院

translation.en: (Gem) Bruv, I didn't say nothing. I swear.
translation.zh: 我什么都没说 我发誓

translation.en: (Chuckling) Don't worry, bruv, this is Summerhouse, word gets around.
translation.zh: 别担心 兄弟 这是夏日公寓没有不透风的墙

translation.en: Look, I know how it is with family and that. You get me?
translation.zh: 我知道家家有本难念的经

translation.en: I know your daddy ain't around, but we are.
translation.zh: 我知道你爸不在身边 但我们在

translation.en: When your mum comes out, it's you that has to step up for her like a man, you know.
translation.zh: 等你妈出来了你得像个男人一样为她遮风挡雨

translation.en: Got to take care of her and all that. Listen, we're your family now.
translation.zh: -你得照顾她什么的-听着 现在我们就是你的家人

translation.en: Right, think of all these lot as your cousins, you get me?
translation.zh: 把这些人都当成你的兄弟姐妹明白吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna look out for you, fam. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 我会罩着你 别担心

translation.en: (Sully) Hey, what. I'm gonna pick you lot up, innit.
translation.zh: 回头我去接你们 好吧？

translation.en: - When? - When you see me, that's when it is.
translation.zh: -什么时候？-就是你见到我的时候

translation.en: Fucking when, man, when. Just be ready.
translation.zh: 傻小子 还问什么时候准备好就行了

translation.en: Bruv, we're gonna be rich.
translation.zh: 哥们 我们要赚大钱了

translation.en: (Sighs) Fuck! (Sully) Do you know how gay you look?
translation.zh: -该死-知道你看着多像基佬吗？

translation.en: Bruv, shut the fuck up. You know how fucking skinny you look, huh?
translation.zh: 闭嘴 你知道你看着多皮包骨吗？

translation.en: - Prick. - (Dushane) You think I'm joking?
translation.zh: -混蛋-你觉得我在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: How you gonna defend yourself on the roads with them fucking skinny arms?
translation.zh: 就你那小胳膊 在路上怎么自卫？

translation.en: (Sully) It's why I've got a knife. So I don't have to do none of this gay shit.
translation.zh: 所以我才带了刀我才不用做这些基佬的事

translation.en: - What you saying, Shane? - Hey, what you saying, man?
translation.zh: -你好吗？桑恩-你好啊 哥们

translation.en: Dushane, I need to ask you a favour, man. Go on. What is it?
translation.zh: -杜桑恩 我得找你帮个忙-说吧 哥们 什么事？

translation.en: I'd really appreciate it if you left Ra'Nell Smith alone.
translation.zh: 如果你离拉内尔史密斯远点我会很感激

translation.en: What's Ra'Nell Smith got to do with you? His mum's a good friend of mine.
translation.zh: -拉内尔史密斯跟你有什么关系？-他妈妈是我朋友

translation.en: So what, bruv? Still ain't got nothing to do with you.
translation.zh: 那又怎样？哥们 跟你没关系啊

translation.en: Like, this is our thing.
translation.zh: 这是我们的事

translation.en: If we wanna talk to someone, we're gonna talk to them.
translation.zh: 我们想找谁说话就找谁说话

translation.en: I'm sorta looking after him while his mum's in hospital.
translation.zh: 他妈妈住院期间算是我在照顾他

translation.en: I promised her I'd keep him out of trouble.
translation.zh: 我答应过她不会让他惹麻烦

translation.en: Didn't you just hear what he said?

translation.en: Think about it, yeah? Plenty other kids out there, man.

translation.en: (Sully) Hope you ain't thinking about it. Who the fuck does he think he is?

translation.en: You know what, leave Ra'Nell out this time, yeah?

translation.en: What, cos of him?
translation.zh: 怎么？就因为他？

translation.en: It's more trouble than it's worth. Fuck him.

translation.en: Come.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: Get on this, jump on this bar.

translation.en: (Sully) We're done. Got shit to do.

translation.en: - (Dushane grunting) - Come on, man.

translation.en: (Sully) What you saying?
translation.zh: 还好吗？

translation.en: Yo! You good?
translation.zh: 哥们 -你还好吗？-挺好的

translation.en: - All right. - (Sully) All right, get in the car, man.
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-挺好的 -上车-我得去牵狗

translation.en: I need to get my dog.
translation.zh: -上车-我得去牵狗

translation.en: You wanna make money or you wanna take your dog for a walk?
translation.zh: 你想赚钱还是想遛狗？

translation.en: (Laughs) Exactly. Get in the car.
translation.zh: 就是啊 上车

translation.en: - No, not you, bro. - What are you talking about?

translation.en: You ain't coming. But Dushane said I should.
translation.zh: -你不能来-可杜桑恩让我去的

translation.en: Dushane nothing. You got a problem, talk to Leon, yeah?
translation.zh: 杜桑恩说的没用 你有问题去找里昂

translation.en: (Sully) Yo.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: Stop making so much fucking noise, man.
translation.zh: 别那么大声 哥们

translation.en: (Laughing) Only joking, man. Fucking hell, don't you talk?
translation.zh: 开玩笑呢 你不会说话吗？

translation.en: (Chantelle) He's all right, man.
translation.zh: 他没事 伙计

translation.en: (Sully) Chantelle, tell him I'm only joking.

translation.en: (Tareek) Gem, you ever been country before? I went once to Hampshire with my nan.
translation.zh: -杰姆 你以前去过乡下吗？-我跟奶奶去过一次汉普郡

translation.en: (Tareek) A country shop with your nan or something.
translation.zh: 你去乡下陪你奶奶购物吗？

translation.en: (Sully) He did not just say that.
translation.zh: 他不是说真的吧

translation.en: (Sully) Nah, nah, nah, that's not the kinda country he's talking about.
translation.zh: 这可不是他说的那种乡下

translation.en: Hey, listen, Gem, this is a whole 'nother country, you know.
translation.zh: 听着 杰姆这是另一种乡下 明白吗？

translation.en: It's not that place you been before, trust me.
translation.zh: 不是你之前去过的那种 相信我

translation.en: He was talking about his fucking nan.
translation.zh: 这哥们居然说起了他奶奶

translation.en: You OK?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: (Boy) Burst his brain, bruv.
translation.zh: 爆他的头 哥们

translation.en: Head popped. Pop him.
translation.zh: 爆头 爆他

translation.en: This is shit, man. You can't even fucking play.
translation.zh: 什么垃圾 根本玩不了

translation.en: This thing's hard, bruv. You get sore thumbs.
translation.zh: 太硬了 哥们 戳得大拇指都疼

translation.en: (Chatter)
translation.zh: -看到了吗？-看到了

translation.en: Good?
translation.zh: 我现在去找你 最近还好吗？

translation.en: (Dris) Now you lot listen, yeah? This is Robert, my best fiend.
translation.zh: 还好吧？哥们 听着 这是罗伯特 是我死党

translation.en: Hey, wake up, man, what's wrong with you? Gazing on the game, man.

translation.en: You get me? He's gonna let everyone know we're here, you get me?

translation.en: Get the line banging. Ain't that right, Robert?

translation.en: Yeah? Yeah? Go sit over there or something, man.

translation.en: Fuck, man.
translation.zh: 上那边坐着去 该死的

translation.en: Make sure you bring my lighter back as well.
translation.zh: 别忘了把我的打火机还回来

translation.en: (Chantelle) Nice to meet you, fam. Fuck, say something.

translation.en: This place is dirty.
translation.zh: -这地方太脏了-小子

translation.en: - I got that, fam. - (Boy) Well done, bruv.

translation.en: Listen, man's gonna blitz this place quick, you get me?

translation.en: In and out, yeah? Before the feds even know man's here.

translation.en: What you saying, fam? Yo, come here, let me talk to you.

translation.en: Come, Rob, get up, man. Go in the other room, man. What's wrong with you?

translation.en: Sit down there, brother.

translation.en: Now it's a simple thing, bruv. All you got to remember

translation.en: is make sure you bring me back the right money every time.
translation.zh: 每次把正确数量的钱带回来就行

translation.en: You understand? All right? Otherwise it's gonna get political.
translation.zh: 明白吗？不然就得按规矩办事了

translation.en: I don't care if it's even, like, five pound. It don't matter.
translation.zh: 我不管是只有5镑还是多少 无所谓

translation.en: You get me? It's the principle, all right?
translation.zh: 明白我的意思吗？这是规矩

translation.en: That five pound there represents respect.
translation.zh: 5镑也代表着尊重 明白吗？

translation.en: Yeah? We're together.
translation.zh: 5镑也代表着尊重 明白吗？ 我们是一起的 任何人出了岔子会影响到所有人 明白吗？

translation.en: Anyone fucks up, it reflects on everyone, you understand?
translation.zh: 我们是一起的 任何人出了岔子会影响到所有人 明白吗？

translation.en: All right, man. Now do your thing, man. Go on.

translation.en: (Sully) Come and get this crack here, man. Fuck all this game shit, man.
translation.zh: 把这家伙弄走 游戏都被他搞砸了

translation.en: (Gem) But I just don't get it.
translation.zh: 我就是没明白

translation.en: Bruv, look, what you have to do, yeah, is practise with your tongue, innit.

translation.en: Get it all agile. Look, see. Drop to the back like this.

translation.en: See? Under your tongue like this. Can you see?
translation.zh: 这样藏到舌头下面 能看到吗？

translation.en: Does it look like I'm holding anything?

translation.en: See, because I've got five on this side, got seven on this side here.
translation.zh: 看 因为我放了五粒在这边这边有七粒

translation.en: If the feds try to stop me, they ain't gonna clock shit in my mouth.
translation.zh: 要是条子拦下我他们在我嘴里什么也查不出来

translation.en: Cos it's all the way back there. See that?
translation.zh: 因为都在这下面

translation.en: - Mm. - All right, look.
translation.zh: 看到了吗？看着

translation.en: Go on, try it.

translation.en: At the back, under your tongue. Way back.

translation.en: That's it, yeah, go on. Way down at the back.

translation.en: - (Coughing) - Shit, what the... Bruv, don't swallow it, bro.

translation.en: Couple of score bags.

translation.en: Oi, what's this street called? Just in case I get lost.

translation.en: Andrews Road, blood.

translation.en: There you go, I've done your laundry for you.

translation.en: What did you say to Dushane and them? You had no right.

translation.en: What was the deal? You can stay here as long as you behave yourself.
translation.zh: 我们之前怎么说的？ 你得守规矩才能继续住这儿

translation.en: Hanging with Dushane and Sully and them, that ain't behaving yourself.
translation.zh: 跟杜桑恩他们混可不叫守规矩

translation.en: You're a hypocrite. You were on the roads with my dad, right?

translation.en: You were in jail with him, for fuck's sake.

translation.en: I see you talking to Dushane and Sully and them again,
translation.zh: 我再看到你跟杜桑恩他们说话我就打给社会福利局

translation.en: I'm calling social services and I'm telling them you're here on your own.
translation.zh: 我再看到你跟杜桑恩他们说话我就打给社会福利局 我会告诉他们 你无依无靠

translation.en: What? You'd hurt my mum like that?

translation.en: Don't you think it would hurt her more, you hanging with them?

translation.en: (Sobbing) Oh, God, no.
translation.zh: 天啊 不

translation.en: Hey, love. Er, just one. Can I have some?

translation.en: - Those OK? - (Chantelle) They're good.
translation.zh: -东西没问题吧？-好得很

translation.en: Enjoy yourself.
translation.zh: -谢了-慢慢享受

translation.en: Bruv, kill him. Kill him, otherwise he'll come after you again. Seriously.

translation.en: Yo.
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: Yeah, fam, what was you looking?

translation.en: All right, just wait in the same place, yeah?

translation.en: Mm. Yo. Three on two.

translation.en: Yo! Yo, fam, come on, man. Three on two for me now, yeah?

translation.en: Same place, yeah?
translation.zh: 帮我送三粒二号 老地方 明白吗？

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: - Yo. - (Man) Yo, have you got six on two?

translation.en: - What you want? - Six on two.
translation.zh: -二号的六粒有吗？-你要什么？ -二号的六粒-行 你在哪儿？

translation.en: - All right, cool. Where you at? - I'm outside.
translation.zh: -二号的六粒-行 你在哪儿？ 我在门外？

translation.en: What the fuck? What you doing outside, bruv?

translation.en: Yo!
translation.zh: 怎么办？

translation.en: What the fuck they doing coming to the house?

translation.en: I don't know. They're outside, bruv.
translation.zh: -他们来干什么？-我怎么知道 -他们在门外了-去把他们打发走

translation.en: Go and sort them out. Tell them not to fucking ever come back again.
translation.zh: -他们在门外了-去把他们打发走 告诉他们别再来了

translation.en: Bruv, don't fucking come back to the house, you hear me, yeah?

translation.en: (Sully) Don't fucking listen. How many times I gotta tell you this?

translation.en: Bruv, I don't...

translation.en: Oi, you idiot,
translation.zh: 蠢货 别再到我们这来了 不然我抽你

translation.en: don't fucking come round our house again or I smack you up, bruv.
translation.zh: 别再到我们这来了 不然我抽你

translation.en: - Where's my money? - Open the fucking gate!
translation.zh: -我的钱呢？-把门打开

translation.en: - Fuck! - Hurry up. Open the gate.

translation.en: Open the gate. Hurry up. Hurry up.

translation.en: (Man) Run him, run him! Nuke him!

translation.en: (Men shouting)
translation.zh: 婊子

translation.en: Hey, yo, country boy!

translation.en: - Oh, you, yeah. - Fuck, no. - (Sully) Big man, yeah? - Get the food, man.

translation.en: Get the fucking food.
translation.zh: 快把货拿上 搞什么

translation.en: - That's right. - I need it like a fucking bitch.
translation.zh: 搞什么 -我得像抽婊子一样抽死你-去拿货

translation.en: (Kamale) Get the food.
translation.zh: -我得像抽婊子一样抽死你-去拿货

translation.en: Fuck, where's the fucking money? Where's the money, B?

translation.en: Where's the fucking money? (Sully) Pick up the money, blood.

translation.en: Fucking play with money, brother.

translation.en: (Dushane) You know you better use that right now, you know? Man's coming after you, fam.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊…

translation.en: I ain't got to do that. Bobby Raikes is gonna do that.
translation.zh: 我不会杀你们的 博比雷克斯会动手

translation.en: Both of you.
translation.zh: 你俩都完了

translation.en: I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 回见

translation.en: - Hey, cuz, let's go. - Pussies! Pussies!
translation.zh: -我们走-两个娘们儿…

translation.en: (Sighs) What the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么

translation.en: Yo, what you doing here?
translation.zh: 你在这儿干什么？

translation.en: You know we're fucked now, innit?
translation.zh: 我们完蛋了 是吧？

translation.en: You've been robbed twice. What you trying to do, make a habit outta this?
translation.zh: 你们已经被抢了两次怎么着？还养成习惯了？

translation.en: Gonna get your money back, all right?
translation.zh: 我们会把你的钱弄回来 好吗？

translation.en: You got three days.
translation.zh: 给你们三天时间

translation.en: You have to be very, very careful.
translation.zh: 你得万分小心

translation.en: We can't tell no one,
translation.zh: 我们不能告诉任何人 尤其是你妈妈

translation.en: especially not your mum.
translation.zh: 我们不能告诉任何人 尤其是你妈妈 我可能会因此进监狱

translation.en: I could go to prison for this.
translation.zh: 我可能会因此进监狱

translation.en: Go inside and smarten yourself up. I got a surprise for you.
translation.zh: 进去把自己收拾收拾我给你准备了惊喜

translation.en: (Sully) We got a snake, bruv.
translation.zh: 有人告密 老兄

translation.en: Gem ain't no snake.
translation.zh: 杰姆才不是内鬼

translation.en: No, I'll tell him to pay. No!
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: (Sully) We mark Shaun like they marked Chris...
translation.zh: 我们给肖恩做点记号就像他们对克里斯那样

translation.en: Sends man a message.
translation.zh: 得给那家伙传递个信息
